modules.title: Forgery detection
modules.description: Detecting the probability of an image being compromised and mark the specific regions that could be forged

modules.title: Watermarking
modules.description: Marking the ownership of an image by embedding a watermark on it that belongs to its owner

modules.title: Steganography
modules.description: Hiding private images and secrets inside other images to protect the privacy of data from eavesdroppers and transition across the internet
